Location: Los Angeles, California
Remote: Remote
Type: Perm
Job #198718
Salary: $150,000.00 Title of Job: Sr. Director, Data & AnalyticsCompany: Beauty / haircareLocation: Los Angeles (REMOTE!)Duration: Full Time PermCompensation: $150K-$180K DoEOverviewServe as a thought leader evolving the way data is utilized to make strategic decisions at the highest levels within the companyCollaborate across the organization to help create an analytics capability roadmap and help drive the execution of that roadmap.Work closely with our commercial channels (.com, Wholesale and Amazon; domestic and international) leads to better leverage data to better understand our customers, improve sales and marketing performance and operational efficienciesThis role will heavily lean towards digital marketing data insightsManage our small but mighty team of data engineers and analystsBusiness Intelligence and ReportingCreate robust, automated reporting and data visualizations to effectively communicate data-driven insights across our total business and for each of our key sales channels Set up self-reporting tools to decentralize data insights for key areas of the business, including but not limited to sales performance, product performance, inventory and subscription managementProvide robust web experience metrics reporting, Google Analytics / Tag Manager conversion event & tagging implementation and conversion rate insights driven analysis.Support strategic evaluation and planning processes across all business functionsAdvanced AnalyticsDevelop analytical models to support paid acquisition optimization, including LTV predictions, cohort analyses, attribution models, brand awareness/affinity metricsGuide team focused on A/B testing & personalization efforts, instilling a culture of disciplined statistical analysis.Lead team in optimizing daily/weekly/monthly product insights, informing consumer journey enhancements and reporting on the subsequent performance impact DataPartner with our Data Engineer to manage our data warehouse and ETL infrastructure across all sales and digital marketing channels and financial systems (NetSuite)Created a unified view of customer data across tools and services used by the businessQualifications7-10 years in a leadership role managing analytics programs, including significant experience in DTC space and digital marketing analyticsPrior experience and knowledge of Shopify, Recharge, Google Analytics, Amazon and NetSuite and with business intelligence solutions (Tableau, Looker, etc.)Highly proficient in the application of statistics and analytical techniques, including regression analysis and statistically rigorous experimentation in marketing contextsSQL and experience in data ETL in large database systemsExperience in running advanced analyses in languages such as Python, R, etc.BS/MS in computer science, mathematics, economics, statistics, engineering or similar program preferredStrong communication and project management skillsOutstanding team player that fosters strong relationships cross-functionallyPrior experience building teams and managing, training and mentoring a team on all aspects of analytics / measurements and recommendations Apply Now The post Sr. Director, Data & Analytics appeared first on JBC Team.
